Kidney dysplasia is also called renal dysplasia or multicystic dysplastic kidney.",NIDDK,Kidney Dysplasia
What is (are) Kidney Dysplasia ?,"The kidneys are two bean-shaped organs, each about the size of a fist. They are located just below the rib cage, one on each side of the spine. Every day, the two kidneys filter about 120 to 150 quarts of blood to produce about 1 to 2 quarts of urine, which is composed of wastes and extra fluid. Chi
